SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Model

Class EventNotificationManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Model.EventNotificationManager
public class EventNotificationManager extends Object
This class is designed to provide methods to the rest of the program for sending notifications to the entrants in certain entrant lists, without having to worry about the details of how we are sending the notification

  • Constructor Details

    • EventNotificationManager

  • Method Details

    • notifyInitialLotterySelection

      public static void notifyInitialLotterySelection(Event event)
      This function is called when we want to notify the winners and the losers of the lottery selection. This function is meant to be called right after we have selected the initial selection has occurred. This function assumes that the users have been correctly added to the correct EntrantList objects by the LotterySelector object already
      Parameters:
      event - The event to notify the winners and losers of

    • notifyLotteryReselection

      public static void notifyLotteryReselection(Entrant entrant, Event event)
      Notifies users who have been reselected by the lottery
      Parameters:
      entrant - The user who has been selected by the lottery
      event - The event they have been reselected for

    • notifyLotteryManualDraw

      public static void notifyLotteryManualDraw(Entrant entrant, Event event)
      Sends a notification to all entrants that were drawn from the manual notification
      Parameters:
      entrant - The user who has been selected by the lottery
      event - The event they have been selected for

    • notifyWaitingList

      public static void notifyWaitingList(Event event, String title, String body)
      Used to allow the organizer to send custom notifications to users in the waiting list
      Parameters:
      event - The event that the organizer is sending notifications for
      title - The title of the notification
      body - The body of the notification

    • notifyChosenList

      public static void notifyChosenList(Event event, String title, String body)
